img_above_text:
# Agate Jar
The Agate Jar is one of the Curios items you can find throughout Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the strongest early-game Curios' thanks to its effect.
With the Agate Jar equipped, you will get a flat-out, moderate defense buff, which is incredibly useful early on in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts the in-game equipment menu from "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically highlighting the "Agate Jar," a rare Curio item. The Agate Jar provides a moderate defense boost, making it a valuable asset for early-game play. The menu also shows other Curios, including "Cat Eye Beads," which slightly increase critical hit chance. The Agate Jar is visually represented with a detailed, ornate design.
